Review Text: so cute. Sticks pretty well with short hair but no so well with long hair. Spruce your outfit with these. The design is very simple. It's very hard to see it and appreciate it. However, I do like the color and almost retro look.
Review Title: Probably wouldn't buy again

Works great. It's perfect for adding a little life back into my hair or revitalizing a hairstyle from the day before. I like that it doesn't just drench my hair in fluids. It lightly coats it allowing me better control of how much water, or other liquid, I want on my hair.
A great find
Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes,Under Eye Patches,Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment,Eye Masks& Puffy Eyes Treatment, Eye Mask for Dark Circles（60 PCS)
Mourvibe
{'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.5 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'UPC': '778365190505'}
I'm not sure if how I applied it is what made it not work or if the product just doesn't work at all.  There was no directions on how to use the product which is the reason for the 1 star it might have been more but I could not get over the fact that it did not come with instructions.  No instructions on the jar, no instructions in the mailing envelope at all.  How are you supposed to know who to apply, when to apply or how to take it off.  I did try and it didn't work but that could because I put it on wrong because again there was NO instructions included with this product.
Did not work on my puff eyes

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Hair and Eye Care Enthusiast:** Strongly focused on enhancing hair and eye aesthetics, with a growing interest in eye makeup alongside hair health.
- **Control in Application:** Prefers lightweight products that facilitate precise application, reflecting an appreciation for user-friendly experiences.
- **Practical Utility:** Values functionality in personal care products, seeking effective solutions for specific needs. Recent interests indicate a desire for understated yet impactful beauty looks.
- **Quality Conscious:** Engages with reputable brands, seeking high-rated products that meet quality expectations and provide clear usage instructions, though recent purchases indicated some disappointment with usability.
- **Critical Review Tendencies:** Maintains an optimistic yet discerning outlook; critical of products that do not deliver on comfort or usability, as seen in her experiences with false eyelashes. Prioritizes quality and beginner-friendly options.
- **Expanding Interests:** New purchases reflect a balance between elegance and dramatic flair, especially in hair accessories, although some products have not met expectations. The evaluation of functionality and visibility in hair adornments shows a nuanced understanding of aesthetic appeal.

Overall, the user values effectiveness, control, and quality in grooming and beauty routines while actively seeking products that satisfy specific preferences, ensuring a gratifying and informed exploration of beauty items.
